General.Name: Qingdao Weflo Valve Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Weflo Valve Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of valve and fire hydrant products worldwide. It offers fire protection, check, foot, ball, pressure relief and reducing, plunger, balancing, copper, gate, flap, plug, globe, butterfly, and air relief valves, as well as rubber expansion joints, backflow prevention, and strainer products. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Qingdao, China.
General.Address: North end of Baoyuan Road, Qingdao, China, 266000
